pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface methods to use with an ActiveQuant Master Server // This R extension provides methods to use a standalone ActiveQuant Master Server from within R. Currently available features include fetching and storing historical data, receiving and sending live data. Several utility methods for simple data transformations are included, too. For support requests, please join the mailing list at https://r-forge.r-project.org/mail/?group_id=1518
